sentence: Monday, Apr 25, 2022 1:52:47 PM Pacific Daylight Time Stephen Wolf NC-11: State Sen. Chuck Edwards' latest ad for next month's Republican primary cuts right to the chase and calls far-right Rep. Madison Cawthorn an Instagramer who posts all day but doesn't actually do anything to solve the country's ongoing problems.
title: Daily Kos Elections Live Digest: 4/25
